"Hello! Growing World!"

PERMACULTURE FEST - INTERNATIONAL SUMMIT 2023

Annual celebration through an event for Organic enthusiats and experts. Harvest knowledge of each other.

01/12/2023 (Mon) ~ 17.12 (Wed)

@ Harvard Square with Daily Happy Hour in the 'Broken Pirate's Pub'
